title: Fornos de Algodres (João Maria de Abreu Castelo Branco Cardoso e Melo, 1st Viscount and 1st Count of)
original_title: Fornos de Algodres (João Maria de Abreu Castelo Branco Cardoso e Melo, Iº visconde e Iº conde de).
body: He was born in 1789 and died on January 7, 1878. He was appointed civil governor of this district, being Viscount of Fornos de Algodres on November 13, 1852, having held this position for about a year.

1852: Appointment as Viscount of Fornos de Algodres
